LBA.HM.summary: Design Hotels AG operates as a full-service hospitality consultant to its member hotels. It offers customized B2B services, including global launch campaigns, sales representation, revenue management, strategic marketing, public relations, and branding. The company represents and markets a selection of approximately 300 hotels in approximately 60 countries worldwide. Design Hotels AG was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Design Hotels AG operates as a subsidiary of Marriott International, Inc.
